summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein discussing the availability of a house and the presence of housekeepers and a chef. It indicates that he will not be available on a specified Sunday and invites the recipient to use the house.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing the use of his house and the staff available.

keyFacts: The email was sent by Jeffrey Epstein.
Epstein mentions that everyone is gone except the housekeepers.
He invites the recipient to use the house.
A chef from Paris is present at the house.
The email indicates that Epstein will not be available on the specified Sunday.
